name: Minimalistic Mayhem Yotsuba Catalog
description: Style intended to work with the Minimalistic Mayhem theme on Appchan X for users who want to use the external Yotsuba Catalog instead of the atrocious local one.
additional_info:
I decided to write a quick style to work with the Minimalistic Mayhem theme for Appchan X after fucking Seaweed decided to stop browsing 4chan(fucking babby bitch).

If you peek into the code, it's goddamn atrocious but it works if you're too stupid to write a style yourself.

Enjoy.
